ygData.subject: Re: Something fun to try
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes if you do it once they will have a hard time ...but if you recieve multiple petitions over time for doing this they will watch you( side note gm s can be
ygData.messageBody:
Yes if you do it once they will have a hard time ...but if you recieve
multiple petitions over time for doing this they will watch you( side note
gm's can be invisible and not appear even with a who all ) and if they
notice you doing this alot even on seperate occasions you will be
warned..the 1st step to banning




At 11:43 PM 6/2/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: "Roop Dirump" <roop@...>
>
>Well it's all a matter of intent. How can Verant say you intended to be
>chased by a sand giant to lead it into some jerk? They'll ban the idiot
>doing this over and over, for the intent is clear. But you do it once as a
>matter of revenge, nobody can prove anything. Just say, "Ah, sorry about
>that, I was being chased." End of story. (Besides, don't think they'll ban
>anybody enacting this once as revenge on a jerk.)
>
>Roop
>
>
>>From: Ben Brockmann <benj@...>
>>
>>Ahh I wasn't aware that you could be banned for something like that, I
>>won't be doing that again.
>>
>>Brendel, Innoruuk
>>
>>Sam Zoucha wrote:
>>>
>>> From: Sam Zoucha <szoucha@...>
>>>
>>> You do know you can be banned for that...i know its tempting but I dont
>>> like seeing anyone do this..even if the person is a jerk...
>>>
>>> At 07:41 PM 6/2/99 -0400, you wrote:
>>> >From: Ben Brockmann <benj@...>
>>> >
>>> >I just recently made the move over from the Rallos Zek (pvp) server to
>>> >the Innoruuk server (non-pvp) and let me tell you, that non-pvp is a lot
>>> >LESS frustration and a lot more fun. However, there are some instances
>>> >in non-pvp where I wish more than anything that I could just open up on
>>> >some stupid fool who insists on being a jerk.
>>> >
>>> >Enter Naluvin, Dark Elf Necro in North Ro.
>>> >
>>> >Naluvin seems to find it funny to load up notorious good-race hater Dorn
>>> >B'Dynn with weapons and then has his good friend train Dorn out so he
>>> >causes mass havok and destruction against the good races in North Ro.
>>> >Then he will NOT shut up about how cool he is for doing it in OOC.
>>> >
>>> >Time to get creative.
>>> >
>>> >I had noticed earlier that there was a sand giant lurking towards the
>>> >zone to oasis and I thought to myself, "Gee, I have Selo's Accelerando
>>> >and a Hand Drum, I can outrun a Sand Giant, can he?" Time to find out.
>>> >Standing at max distance, I twisted the bard lull song (level 8 song,
>>> >forget the name) which was (of course) resisted with Selo's and the
>>> >chase was on. Using Selo's and my drum, I lead the SG right on top of
>>> >Naluvin et Voila... no more witty Dark Elf comments in OOC.
>>> >
>>> >This is also useful for clearing out EXCESSIVE campers of the derv camps
>>> >in NRO and other areas, especially those who get rather vocal when you
>>> >ask if you can have a kill or two.
>>> >
>>> >I wouldn't recommend trying this unless you have a drum in hand, and if
>>> >you want to try and turn the sand giant, make sure you give him a wide
>>> >berth.
>>> >
>>> >Please understand, I am not a vindictive person in anyway and I do not
>>> >take part in kill stealing or monster healing or things like that. I
>>> >just found that this was the limit to my tolerance and something had to
>>> >be done!
>>> >
>>> >Brendel, Innoruuk.
>>> >
>>> >------------------------------------------------------------------------

>>> >
